item.title: M
item.description: score:100 Chances: Macy’s rejected a $5.8 billion buyout offer and is being pressured to sell its prime Herald Square location, indicating potential for increased shareholder value through strategic decisions. Private-equity firm Sycamore Partners is considering a potential bid to purchase Macy’s, suggesting the possibility of a new takeover offer and potential for stock price increase.
